text: Lumberto Ignacio Campbell is a Nicaraguan Sandinista politician. Campbell is from Bluefields, Nicaragua and in the 1980s served as Vice-Minister for the Atlantic Coast. In 2014, the National Assembly named him to the Supreme Electoral Council, where he replaced Emmett Lang as vice-president. Campbell's brother, Francisco Campbell, is Nicaragua's Ambassador to the United States. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Sandinista National Liberation Front politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Lumberto Campbell
